page.title: 12Religion
page.content: The following identifies the many religious groups practising in Dereham their places of worship, clergy etc. St. Nicholas Parish Church, Church Street, Rev.H.Tait, Curate Rev. Robert Gillion. Baptist Church, High Street, Rev.Stanley Hall. The Methodist Church Theatre Street,Rev.Colin Riches. The Salvation Army Citadel, St.Nicholas Street, Lt.Roberta Fraser. Cowper Congregational Church, Market Place, Rev.Richard Woodhouse. Christian Fellowship, Commercial Road, Mr.Harris Buddhists, London Road, Mushinodokai Kongoryuji. Spiritual Church High St.Mrs.Gordon.Christadelphians, Disabled Club.Roman Catholics, Commercial Rd, Fr.P.Shryane. Pentecostal Fellowship,Courtney Close. Jehovahs Witnesses,Old Peoples Club, Mr.Farish.Abundent Life,Conservative Club,Mr.S.Howell.Quakers,Disabled Club
